body:
Hi Navid,


Can you be a little more specific?  Do you want to report radiance values in watts/meter^2, or some other quantity?  How do you want the spectrum averaged?  How did you capture your HDR photo?  Do you have Photosphere?  Do you have Radiance installed?


Best,
-Greg
